titles.en: Chapter 43 – The one who says, ‘There is no god except for Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, truly, truly’

verses.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى الْأَرْمِينِيِّ عَنْ أَبِي عِمْرَانَ الْخَرَّاطِ عَنِ الْأَوْزَاعِيِّ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ مَنْ قَالَ فِي كُلِّ يَوْمٍ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ حَقّاً حَقّاً لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ عُبُودِيَّةً وَ رِقّاً لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ إِيمَاناً وَ صِدْقاً أَقْبَلَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ بِوَجْهِهِ وَ لَمْ يَصْرِفْ وَجْهَهُ عَنْهُ حَتَّى يَدْخُلَ الْجَنَّةَ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Muhammad Bin Isa Al Armeeny, from Abu Imran Al Kharrat, from al Awzai’y, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘The one who says during every day, ‘There is no god except Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, truly, truly. There is no god except Allah<sup>azwj</sup> for worship and to be enslaved to. There is no god except Allah<sup>azwj</sup> to believe in and ratify’, Allah<sup>azwj</sup> would Turn His<sup>azwj</sup> Face towards him and will not Turn His<sup>azwj</sup> Face away from him until he enters the Paradise’.
